#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,x;
	register int i;
	double arr[1000001],ans=0;
	for(i=1;i<1000001;i++)
	{
		ans+= log10((double)i);
		arr[i] = (int)(ceil(ans));
	}
	arr[0]=arr[1]=arr[2]=1;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>x;
		cout<<(int)(ceil(arr[x]))<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
